page.title: 09HAWBUSH, COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content:
The wide range of varied activities on offer at the{Hawbush Community {Centre,}gives a good insight into the importance of such an establishment to the inhabitants of an area such as ours. Today's programme includes:-
Dog training {*}The In-Between club Table tennis {*}The Inner Wheel The Red Cross{*}Dancing classes Whist club {*}Stourbridge Railway S. Cycling club {*}Guides and Brownies Bingo {*}Flower arranging class Keep fit {*}Theatre group Sewing class {*}Over 60's club Disco dancing{*}Playgroups
There is also a Townswomen's Guild and a club for the physically handicapped. In addition, religious services are held each Sunday.
